actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize a pilot program for the treatment and rehabilitation of veterans with alcohol or drug-dependent disabilities, and for other purposes.
subjects: Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to conduct a three year pilot program for the treatment and rehabilitation in community-based treatment facilities of veterans with alcohol and drug dependencies.
